display_long_description:
# NEEDS & SURVIVAL
Isolated from the rest of the world, you must rely on your own wits and limited resources to survive harsh conditions in this **Sandbox Survival**.  

Your main goal is to stay alive, but how?

**Build your Base**: Build a shelter to escape the frost and replenish vital strengths. 

**Tools & Weapons**: To survive and fully exploit your surroundings, you will need a variety of tools. 

**Hunt, Craft & Gather**: Hunt wild animals to gain food and resources. 
[media]

# WINTER & WILDERNESS

Strategizing your moves is crucial to staying alive. **Weather conditions** are unpredictable and change dynamically, so always be prepared! Explore a **huge map**, but remember that not every place is safe; some may be inaccessible based on your current gear.

[media]

# SAFE & SANE
Survival isn’t just about staying alive, it’s also about **staying sane**.
In Frost Survival VR, you must take care of not only your physiological needs but also your mental health. If you neglect it, reality may start to blur with illusion. **Fake sounds** and **creatures** will make survival even more challenging. 

[media]

# MULTIPLAYER EXPERIENCE
Try to survive **alone** or **cooperate** with others in a multiplayer experience.
Do you like playing alone? Don’t worry, there are some uncovered secrets scattered across the frozen wilderness that will help you endure. Or work together with other players. **Shape your survival sandbox experience your way!**

[media]

The project is co-funded by the MEDIA strand of the European Union’s Creative Europe Programme. 

[media]

# SAFE & SANE
Survival isn’t just about staying alive, it’s also about **staying sane**.
In Frost Survival VR, you must take care of not only your physiological needs but also your mental health. If you neglect it, reality may start to blur with illusion. **Fake sounds** and **creatures** will make survival even more challenging.

# MULTIPLAYER EXPERIENCE
Try to survive **alone** or **cooperate** with others in a multiplayer experience.
Do you like playing alone? Don’t worry, there are some uncovered secrets scattered across the frozen wilderness that will help you endure. Or work together with other players. **Shape your survival sandbox experience your way!**
